name: Encore
effect: Reaction. For the duration of this effect at the start of round before rolling for Initiative, the target rolls 1 dice. On a 1-3 the target will repeat the same action that instigated Encore. For the purposes of Support Moves and Stat Changes their action is treated as a separate move (allowing for encored support/status moves to stack with themselves once). On a 4-6 the target may act as normal. Last 4 Rounds.
description: The user claps and cheers at the target to encourage it to repeat what it just did.
